It's that time of year. Conditioning starts tomorrow August 3rd from 3-4pm Monday- Friday. It is highly recommended that you attend. Please share this post with anyone that is planning on playing soccer this year.

post_text: Mrs Snyder's 3rd grade Zoom class meeting had a very special visitor today. Author Sandra Markle stopped in and chatted with the kids about her career as an author. She showed them her book closets filled with copies of her published books. She has published over 200 books. She also answered questions that they had. Her favorite book that she has written is A Mother's Journey. It's about emperor penguins. This was her favorite book because she got to travel and live in Antartica while studying penguins, she even had a penguin named after her! She also stayed on an ice breaker for 30 days. She has touched an elephant, held a boa constrictor and a tarantula. She talked to the kids about her process of revising a book. It takes her about 6 months to revise/edit a book. She loves to read her books out loud and listen in order to make changes to her books. Mrs. Snyder's class was very excited for their special visitor.

In conclusion, this piece was to represent JMS Pride."

We are in the process of making a plan for creating and distributing meals in the future. Once we have the proper food and a plan of action, we will reach out to you.

Sincerely,

Chellie Broesamle

For the last few years, our school has offered a "couch to 5K" running program for our older students. We call it "Comet Cruisers." We train during March, April, and May culminating with our own Riverfest and compete in a 5K race. This is a huge goal for elementary students to attempt.

We are asking you today to ask for your help in sponsoring elementary students in the Comet Cruisers running program. The cost to sponsor each runner is $60. We are hoping to offer the program to 60 students in the 3rd, 4th, and 5th grade. If you sponsor 3 or more students, your business or personal name will appear on the back of our t-shirt we use at our final run.

Help us give our students beginnings to a healthy lifestyle. Will you help sponsor a student or two? This pledge will provide those shoes, shirt, and certificate to a student who completes the 5K run.

Thank you,

Rachel Mandrelle & Sarah Gray
Coordinators of Comet Cruisers
Williams Elementary School
